scripts.build:server: export VITE_SVELTE_HYDRATABLE=1 && rm -rf dist && vite build --ssrManifest --outDir dist/client && vite build --ssr src/server-render.ts --outDir dist/tmp && cp -r src/adapters dist/tmp
scripts.build:nodejs: npm run build:server && rollup -c -i dist/tmp/adapters/nodejs/index.ts && npm run build:clean
scripts.build:netlify: npm run build:server && rollup -c -i dist/tmp/adapters/netlify/index.ts && npm run build:clean
scripts.build:netlify-edge: npm run build:server && rollup -c -i dist/tmp/adapters/netlify-edge/index.ts && npm run build:clean
scripts.build:cloudflare: npm run build:server && rollup -c -i dist/tmp/adapters/cloudflare/index.ts -o functions/[[catchall]].js && cp src/adapters/cloudflare/_routes.json dist/client/ && npm run build:clean
